212946.en:
I was afraid that my grand dream of becoming an alchemist and becoming rich in this country, which has been
plagued by a series of calamities, might come to nothing.

212948.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Earthquakes happen all the time, and
the guidelines are not updated again.
Is it safe to stay in Royal City?

212950.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>It seems to have subsided. It's times
like this when we need a guiding light
to guide us to a better future.

212952.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>The earthquakes are increasing day by
day. I don't know if it's safe to stay
in Royal City!

212954.en:
Before His Majesty the King ascended to the throne, there were rumors that Mereade had been seen in the Royal
City.

212958.en:
This is Royal City Kimbel. Our country, which has prospered with alchemy as its foundation, has been at
a loss to cope with frequent earthquakes.

212960.en:
We are guarding this gate for His Majesty the Quard, and I'm sure His Majesty will resume updating the Time
Guidebook in due course.

212962.en:
What a stupid situation! Even though His Majesty the Quard has just ascended to the throne, there's no
coronation ceremony, and there's no sake to be served.

212964.en:
I hear that His Majesty Quard is also blowing his trumpet about stopping earthquakes, but instead of stopping
them, they're actually increasing!

212966.en:
The Lord Quard in the hearts of the people is still the same as he was as a boy. But now that he's suddenly
become an adult, I'm worried that his impersonator is using the name of Master Quard to take down the throne.

212968.en:
This is Royal City Kimbel. Our country, which flourished on the foundation of alchemy, has been held
back by the frequent earthquakes. However, I believe that His Majesty Quard will definitely bring this
situation under control.

212970.en:
What I would like to ask to do is to find an alchemist who can alchemize Geode
Crystal and ask him or her to actually do it. Please show the recipe I invented to the alchemist you think
he/she can do it, and ask him/her if he/she can do it. By the way, people who make a living as an alchemist wear
robes like the one I wear, so you should be able to recognize them by their appearance. As for the rest,
well, instead of blindly searching around, it would be better to visit alchemists you know in this country
and ask them to introduce you to excellent ones.

212972.en:
The buildings in Royal City are sturdy and will not collapse easily, but what will happen if the earthquakes
continue?

212974.en:
Hmmm...alchemy of special minerals. I'm good at making fertilizers and the like, but in a field outside of my
expertise, it's this complicated. I'm sorry, but it looks like it's out of my hands. I think the only person in
Royal City who can make this according to the recipe is Zef.
212974.ja:

ã€Œãµã‚€â€¦â€¦ç‰¹æ®Šãªé‰±ç‰©ã®ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘ã‹ã€‚ ã€€è‚¥æ–™ãªã©ã‚’ä½œã‚‹ãªã‚‰ã€€ãŠæ‰‹ã®ã‚‚ã®ã ãŒ ã€€å°‚é–€å¤–ã®åˆ†é‡ã§ã€€ã“ã‚Œã ã‘ã€€è¤‡é›‘ã ã¨â€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œãã‚„ã—ã„ãŒã€€ç§ã®æ‰‹ã«ã¯ã€€è² ãˆãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã ã€‚ ã€€ã“ã„ã¤ã‚’ã€€ãƒ¬ã‚·ãƒ”ã©ãŠã‚Šã«ã€€ä½œã‚Œãã†ãªã®ã¯ ã€€ç‹éƒ½ã§ã¯ã€€ã‚¼ãƒ•ãã‚‰ã„ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‹ãªã€‚

212976.en:
The recipe for a mineral called Geode Crystal is out of my field of expertise. I think Zef is the only one
in Royal City who can make it according to the recipe.

212978.en:
I want a guidebook! At the very least, I wish I could create a Time Guidebook that would be useful only to me, using
the power of alchemy.

212980.en: <attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Hmm? Is it a request for alchemy?<bw_break>

212982.en:
Even if I had a recipe, as an alchemist's egg, I can't do such complicated alchemy. If I could, it
would be my master Gandak or Zef. Anyway, I can't do it!

212984.en:
Everyone is buying medicinal herbs and daily necessities, which keeps us alchemists very busy. I guess that's
why they're afraid of earthquakes.

212986.en:
You want me to alchemize this? Let's see. Oh no~ I can't figure it out from the very first step. Even though the
recipe is complete, I wonder if there is anyone who can realize such a complicated alchemy.

212988.en:
The recipe you showed me is honestly too much for me. Try other alchemists. I think Gandak and Zef might still be
able to make it.

212990.en:
These days, customers are always asking me for alchemy without any kind of reservation. I wish they would take
a little care of their old people.

212992.en:
I'm sorry, but we're all booked up with smelting requests. If you are in a hurry, you can ask Gandak's store or
Zef's kid for help.

212994.en:
I'm sorry, but we're all booked up with smelting requests. If you are in a hurry, you can ask Gandak's store or
Zef's kid for help.

212996.en:
Lately, Bachan has been getting out more. She is discussing with Zef and Gandak and other alchemists about the
future.

212998.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>What? A request for alchemy? You have
to get permission from Granny before
you do something like that.

213000.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>If you want to make a request, talk to
Grandma first. We can't accept
requests without her permission.

213002.en:
Yo . Everything okay? We've been having weird earthquakes here all morning and night, and it's
really killing me.

213004.en:
What? You want me to make this? Hmmm... let's see. My specialty is magical creatures. It's hard to make a
recipe for a mineral that requires so many steps unless you're a specialist.

213006.en:
Geode Crystal, right? I'm sorry, but I don't think I can do it. My specialty is magical creatures, and minerals are
not my specialty. Well, even if I can't do it, maybe Mr. Zef can do it. Why don't you ask him to take a look
at my recipe?

213008.en:
This man seems to be an alchemist.
Shall I show you the Geode Crystal
Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213012.en:
This man seems to be an alchemist.
Shall I show you the Geode Crystal
Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213016.en:
Linka is an alchemist. Shall I show
you the Geode Crystal Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213020.en:
Zef is an alchemist. Shall I show you
the Geode Crystal Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213024.en:
Terence is an alchemist. Shall I show
you the Geode Crystal Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213028.en:
This man seems to be an alchemist.
Shall I show you the Geode Crystal
Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213032.en:
This man seems to be an alchemist.
Shall I show you the Geode Crystal
Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213036.en:
This man seems to be an alchemist.
Shall I show you the Geode Crystal
Recipe?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

213040.en:
Earthquake and scared Even if the days of anxiety continue, eating a good meal will give you hope. You can't
make money if you're hungry!

213042.en:
You want something to eat? I'll make you anything you want. Geode Crystal, I guess it's not food. I'm not good at
smelting anything other than food. I'm sorry, but you'll have to find someone else.

213044.en:
I showed you the recipe, but I'm not very good at smelting anything other than food. I'm sorry, but you'll have
to find someone else.

213046.en:
Thank you for helping Didi Dianji! That's why he changed his mind. Dianji would still be in agony
right now if you hadn't come along. So I'm grateful to you!

213048.en:
There have been a series of strange earthquakes in Royal City recently. I have looked into the history of
Ethene, and there have been almost no earthquakes observed.

213050.en:
Oh? asked you to do this? I'm so excited to be able to do it. Let's take a look at the recipe
right away. Well, it is too unorganized to be a recipe, and there is still room for optimization. As it
is, it is difficult even for me. As far as I know, the only person who can make this recipe is Master Wagmika,
who used to be the director of Royal Alchemia. It would be best to ask him. He is living in Freedom Village now.

213052.en:
I saw your recipe, but it's still unorganized and has room for optimization. As it is, it is
difficult even for me. As far as I know, the only person who can make this recipe is Master Wagmika, who
used to be the director of Royal Alchemia. It would be best to ask him. He is living in Freedom Village now.

<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh no <pc>! What's that sunny
look on your face? Did you bring Geode
Crystal?<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><break><case_cancel><break><case_end>

213056.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>My expectations were too high and I
misunderstood you. I'm sorry. I got
excited on my own.

213058.en:
Mr. Wagmika was the director of Alchemia when I worked there. From my point of view, he was a man above the
clouds. I heard that he has washed his feet from alchemy and is now living a retired life, but to move the heart of
such a person is indeed impressive. I've also completed another tool necessary for the operation, Detection
Rods. Please accept it!

213060.en:
Let me explain the details of the operation that Mr. Quard has just informed us about. It is not widely
known, but this island is sustained by the geo-energy that flows in the bottom of the earth. However, that
geo-energy is running out, and it is predicted that the entire Ethene Kingdom will be submerged in water in
the not-too-distant future. After investigating, we have discovered that someone or something lurking in the
depths of the earth is responsible for the decline in the earth's veins of energy. So, we must collect the energy
and evacuate the island before it is depleted! That is Mr. Quard's strategy.

213062.en:
<pc> showed Dianji the Geode
Crystal and told him that Wagmika, a
free man, had smelted it for him.

213064.en:
<pc> received Detection Rods
(Key Item) from Dianji.<me 60>

213066.en:
This is where the Detection Rods I just gave you come in handy. Please try them now. They work in and out of
my house. If you use the Detection Rods at Royal City Kimbel, please let me know and I will tell you the rest
of the story.

213068.en:
Did you have a chance to use Detection Rods? You heard the numbers that indicate the coordinates, right? This
number indicates the distance from the ground to , where the geothermal energy can be absorbed. Aim
for the point where both of these numbers reach zero. That will be the spring point of Royal City Kimbel.
Please note that the spring point is not visible. They do not glow in the dark. Once you move to the spring, use
the ''Geode Crystal'' from the Key Items menu. You should be able to absorb the geode energy. The springs are located
in Royal City Kimbel Ethene Kingdom Area Bantryu Region. What I would like to do is to use the
Geode Crystal at the three spring points to absorb the geode energy. Please report to Mr. Quard when you
have completed the absorption of geode energy at the three spring points.

213070.en:
Oh, no, it's not good. Even as I'm doing this, the geo-energy seems to be decreasing more and more. What? If we
absorb the geo-energy when it's already decreasing, we'll be submerged even faster? That's right, but this is
the only way to get rid of the underground culprit. For now, please trust me and cooperate.

213072.en:
I've told a lot of things that I'd like to ask of you, but is there anything you'd like to go
over again?

213074.en:
The island is sustained by the geo- energy flowing in the bottom of the earth, but in recent years, the geo-
energy is running out and it is predicted that the entire Ethene Kingdom will be submerged in water in
the not-too-distant future. After investigating, we have discovered that someone or something lurking in the
depths of the earth is responsible for the decline in the earth's vein energies. So, before the pulse energy
is depleted, let's collect it and evacuate the island! That's what Quard-sama's strategy is. Well, that's
about all I have to say about stopping the submergence.

213076.en:
In order to absorb geothermal energy, you must first locate a spring point. Try using Detection Rods in one of the
Royal City Kimbel Ethene Kingdom Area Bantryu Region. Detection Rods will tell you the distance between
and the spring point. If both of these values are zero, then this is the spring point of the land.
Note that a spring point is not visible to the eye. It does not glow in the dark. After moving to the
spring, use the ''Geode Crystal'' from the Key Items menu. You should be able to absorb the geode energy. Report to
Mr. Quard when you have absorbed geode energy in Royal City, Kimbel, Ethene Kingdom Area, and Bantryu Region.
Well, that's about it for the explanation of how to collect geo- energy.

213078.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I see. Then, please be sure to absorb
geo-energy from the three spring
points.

213080.en:
Oh my ! The Geode Crystal is shining so brightly! It seems that it has safely absorbed geode energies
from the three spring points. If so, I'd like to report it to Mr. Quard!

213082.en:
I have been ordered by Mr. Quard to accompany you to Meteorite Hole. As soon as you are ready, please go to
Meteorite Hole, east of Tiplone Highlands. Let's save the Ethene Kingdom together.

213084.en:
Beyond this gate is Tiplone Highlands. If you want to go to Meteorite Hole, you should go up the mountain to the
east. Incidentally, it is further east than Freedom Village. There is a lone soldier standing guard, so ask him to
let you through.

213086.en:
The survival of Ethene Kingdom depends on ! I'm sorry for putting pressure on you, Momo! But,
but..! This is a fact without a doubt.

213090.en:
Even though the Royal Army has declared the earthquake over, people are still skeptical, and emergency
rations are still selling well.

213092.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Did you know? There are no more
earthquakes! I just heard the
announcement from the Royal Army.

213094.en:
I don't know about you, but I think they are saying that the earthquake countermeasures are complete! Then the
next step is to revive the guidelines. Then, the next step is to revive the guidelines!
213094.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆãã€€ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ã‚“ãŒã€€åœ°éœ‡ã¸ã®å¯¾ç­–ã¯ ã€€å®Œäº†ã—ãŸã£ã¦ã„ã†ã€€è©±ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã‹ï¼ ã€€ã ã£ãŸã‚‰ã€€æ¬¡ã¯ã€€æŒ‡é‡æ›¸ã®å¾©æ´»ã ãªã€‚

ã€Œã‚¯ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ‰é™›ä¸‹ã«ã¯ã€€ã‚ˆã‚Šã€€ã„ã£ãã† ã€€ãŒã‚“ã°ã£ã¦ã€€ã„ãŸã ã‹ãªãã¦ã¯ï¼

213096.en:
I'm glad you were able to stop the earthquake. Above all, I am happy that I could be of help to Mr. Quard for
the first time in a long time. I don't think we have cooperated with each other like this since we tried to
rescue who was about to be sentenced to the golden punishment. At that time, I was trying to save
him, but he saved me... it wasn't cool, was it?

213098.en:
Come on, come on! How about some fresh flowers? We have colorful flowers grown freely in the rich water of
Ethene. We recommend the alchemy blue roses! You won't find such a brilliant flower in any other town!

213100.en:
His Majesty Quard's skill in bringing the earthquake to an end by eliminating the source of the problem,
rather than taking a stopgap measure, is truly remarkable. I think it is safe to say that this is a feat that
will go down in history. I am very proud of his young age.

213102.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Hey there, travelers! I'm a Kimbel
expert, and I'll give you some good
information about the Royal City.<bw_break>

213104.en:
There was an Abangiardian announcement that His Majesty Quard has stopped the earthquakes that have been shaking the
city day and night. I, who was born and raised in Royal City, have been thinking about moving to a new place,
but now I can rest easy and settle down in this country.

213106.en:
Beyond this gate is the Tiplone Highlands. If you head northwest, you should be able to reach the Made
Temple. However, Made Temple is a forbidden place for the royal family. The door is also sealed, so it is not
possible to enter.

213108.en:
Hmmm. I can only assume that the lack of earthquakes is nature's eerie silence. Even now, strain is building
up beneath the ground, and one day! One day, an earthquake of the magnitude that could collapse the
island! Scary, scary, scary.

213110.en:
In case of emergency, I will use my courage to lead Linka to a safe place! Because I myself am a competent
butler! But now that the earthquake has been declared over, I'm glad to hear it, but I also feel like I've
been deprived of the opportunity to prove my competence.

213112.en:
It's a bit depressing, isn't it? Didn't they make a happy announcement that the earthquake is over? Then you
can at least drink, Hiccup!

213114.en:
Your Majesty stopped the earthquake! With this, I'll be able to leave my anxious days behind. I think I'll
start a special sale of alchemy to share my joy with everyone.

213116.en:
These days, customers are always asking me for alchemy without any kind of reservation. I wish they would take
a little care of their old people.

213118.en:
Have you heard the announcement that the earthquake is over? While we were discussing countermeasures, it seems
like it was resolved before we knew it.

213120.en:
I heard that a giant monster was causing earthquakes because of some underground mischief. His Majesty and
the Royal Army do what they have to do when they have to do it! How dare you capture someone who looks like he
can't be touched from our side?

213122.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>His Majesty Quard has done a hell of a
job stopping earthquakes, hasn't he?

213124.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>The Royal Army declared the earthquake
over, but the truth is, you're the one
who solved it, not the Royal Army.<yesno><break>

213126.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>What? No? Maybe my instincts are off
too.

213128.en:
I knew it! If it's due to your success, I guess we can trust the announcement of the Royal Army. From
now on, I'll be able to sleep peacefully without being frightened by earthquakes.

213130.en:
It was announced that His Majesty's secret operation to end the earthquake has been completed. They explained
that the cause of the earthquake was a monster in the depths of the earth, but I can't get a sense of it. I
wonder if it was an unimaginably huge monster.

213132.en:
Hee hee hee. I'm a shut-in, but I know the earthquake is over. But I have a hunch. This earthquake is a harbinger
of a natural disaster. I'm sure it's not the end. But I think I'm going to stay here and smelt until the end.
This is my only home.

ã€Œã ã‘ã©ã€€åƒ•ã¯ã€€æœ€å¾Œã®æ™‚ã‚’è¿ãˆã‚‹ã¾ã§ ã€€ã“ã“ã«å¼•ãã“ã‚‚ã£ã¦ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã†ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€åƒ•ã®å®¶ã¯ã€€ã“ã“ã ã‘ã•â€¦â€¦ã‚¤ãƒ’ãƒƒã€‚

213134.en:
The days of living in fear because of the earthquake have been numbered, but they are over now. I feel like
celebrating from the stage.

213136.en:
I used to have to turn off the fire in the kitchen every time an earthquake hit, but I guess from now on I'll be
free from the stress of having to interrupt the cooking process every now and then.

213138.en:
This is Royal City Kimbel, where the Royal Army has declared the earthquake over. Travelers, rest assured, you are
safe to enter.

213140.en:
I heard that earthquakes don't happen anymore. If that's the case, it's okay if you've eaten the hijoshoku in your
cheeks!

213142.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I heard that it doesn't wobble
anymore. Gungjin-san told me that.

213144.en:
Because came to us, the situation has turned out well. And now, as a result, we are here! But,
but...! What I'm wondering is that before the earthquake, Kuku Quard would have gone with
to destroy the cause of the earthquake! Considering his position as the king of this country, he has
decided to give up on the son of a bitch, or is there some other reason? I can sense the beginning of a change!

213146.en:
According to the Royal Army, the source of the earthquakes was a monster that was doing bad things deep
in the earth. Moreover, it was not the monster that was causing the earthquakes, but the monster that was
depleting the earth's vein energy, which in turn was causing the earthquakes to occur. I have never
been aware of geo-energy, but I guess it means that what we see is not all there is.
213146.ja:

213633.en:
Good condition! No malfunctions are found. The Eternal Ring is now executing the order to refine the
power of time travel from the atmosphere. First, I'll order Eternal Ring to give Mereade the authority to
operate it. Kyuru? That's strange. Mereade is wearing a wristlet, but the device remains silent.

213635.en:
A seal has been placed! This is apparently the same kind of seal that was placed on the Made Temple. That
means I should be able to break it with Quard's Timeseer's Key. I'll ask Quard to do it!

213639.en:
Go to the plaza in Royal City Kimbel
to activate the Eternal Ring.

213641.en:
Go to the plaza in Royal City Kimbel
to activate the Eternal Ring.

213643.en:
Would you like to activate the Eternal
Ring?<yesno><close>

213645.en:
This is Royal City Kimbel, where the Royal Army has declared the earthquake over. Travelers, rest assured, you may
enter. Hm? Where is the Eternal Ring? Where is it? Nothing. You can see it from here. The one you're looking for
is in the plaza straight ahead.

213647.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>You know what? I saw a man with a
mouthpiece named ''Kyu'' by the air-
conditioning facility! It's true!

213649.en:
The Eternal Ring is currently sealed, so it will not accept orders from the outside. But with Quard's Timeseer's
Key, I should be able to break the seal. I'm going to ask Quard!

213651.en:
Inside the giant, slowly spinning device, a strange-colored, shimmering liquid seems to mark time with
regularity.

213653.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>You know what? I saw a young man whose
mouth was called ''Kyu'' by the
Eikyuujikan. He's gone now, though.

213655.en:
I have taught my children to carry the guidelines with them at all times, but what in the world is the value of a
policy book that has not been updated?

213657.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>We're selling emergency rations like
hotcakes right now, and we're running
a little low on supplies.<bw_break>

213659.en:
Why doesn't Army Headquarters make any announcement? Isn't it reasonable to at least let them know if an
evacuation is necessary?

213661.en:
If a meteorite crashes down on the barrier protecting Royal City, there's no way we can escape. But His Majesty
Quard will take care of it. You might as well think about it and have a drink. If you think seriously, you'll
go crazy with anxiety!

213663.en:
It pains me to go back to being rootless again, but as they say, life is what we make of it. We must make
preparations for evacuation as soon as possible.

213665.en:
I am sure that Quard will contact us if he needs our help. I'm sure Mr. Quard is thinking of a countermeasure
right now. We will not rush to Army Headquarters and steal Quard's time, we will wait and see.

213667.en:
I know that this is not the time to be selling flowers, but I don't know what to do because there are no guidelines.
But since there are no guidelines, I don't know what to do.

213669.en:
His Majesty Quard even stopped an earthquake. I'd like to believe that he'll save us again, but he's been
holed up in the Army Headquarters since then, and there's no sign of him coming out. Isn't now the time for him
to come out to his people and calm their fears?

213671.en:
It was a hissy fit when the crowd surged forward. It seems to have quieted down now, but I can't help but
feel the embers of a riot are still smoldering.

213673.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Hey there! I'm a Kimbel expert, and
I've got some good news about the
Royal City.<bw_break>

213679.en:
It's obvious from looking up at the sky. A huge meteorite fell on Royal City Kimbel. Even I, a man of
Abangiardo's heart, am terrified, thinking that the Protection Barrier will not be able to withstand the
energy of the impact of the huge meteorite.

213681.en:
I know it would be better to evacuate to a safer place outside of the country, but I have no intention of
abandoning my country under any circumstances. I have made up my mind that I will live and die in Royal City
Kimbel.

213683.en:
If I don't do something, I'll be crushed by a meteorite. But where should I run to? This is when you need
the guidance of the guidelines!

213685.en:
I can't even relax with that huge thing floating above the city. I think we should move to Strange Island, east
of Greater Ethene. The currents are making it hard to get there.

213687.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>I don't want to evacuate if I can help
it! It is unforgivable for a soldier
to leave his post without permission!

213689.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>We have just overcome a natural
threat, an earthquake. Is Ethene
Kingdom cursed?

213691.en:
We came all the way here to make this our second home, you know? But because of the meteorite, it's ruined. Ah~
Evacuation is super tedious!

213693.en:
In case of emergency, I will protect Linka-sama at my own risk! Because I am a competent butler! What? What
exactly will I do? Well, I'll think about that from now on!

213695.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I am too weak to stay here, but I
would like Nancy to leave Ethene
Kingdom at least.

213697.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>The day of the week is the most
important day of the week. One clean
diaper is all you need.

213699.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I'll sober up if I see a meteorite
about to fall on me!

213701.en:
The fact that His Majesty stays at the Army Headquarters is proof that Royal City Kimbel is safe. He will solve
this problem.

213703.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>O God! Why do You give the Ethene
Kingdom many trials? Please, please,
have mercy on us.

213705.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>You saw the meteorite, didn't you?
What a mess.<bw_break>

213707.en:
Oh, my God. I was able to say goodbye to the anxiety of the earthquake, but now I have a new kind of anxiety. I
wonder if I should say goodbye to Ethene Kingdom if I want to spare my life.

213709.en:
The customers who came to ask for alchemy were all complaining about being destroyed by a meteorite. It's
very disturbing.

213711.en:
I wonder how long the device that creates the barrier will keep working. I'm so scared that if it runs out of
energy or something, it will stop working.

213713.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>The rain is falling, but as long as we
stay in Kimbel, we'll be safe. That's
what my dad said, so it's true!

213715.en:
How can one disaster after another occur so soon after the earthquakes have ended? Ethene Kingdom is already
finished.

213717.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>It's the end of the line. I don't know
what to do at all. I just want to get
drunk and forget about reality.

213719.en:
Maybe I should evacuate too. Maybe this is not the time to be talking about studying hard and becoming an
alchemist.

213721.en:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! YOU listen to me! I'm going to use alchemy to turn rocks into gold and become a
millionaire! This is my dream. But my grand dream is about to be crushed by a giant rock. That's not what I'm
talking about!

213723.en:
I've seen it, you know! I saw Mereade talking to the despairing Quard about something. He was giving him a secret
plan to protect Royal City from the meteorite. That's right!

213725.en:
Zef told me to start preparing for evacuation, but I don't know how many days of emergency rations I should
prepare. If Royal City is crushed by a meteorite, will we have to live like the free people?

213727.en:
I can't believe that after earthquakes, meteorites are next. It's times like this when we need
guidelines, yet they're still not updated! The guidelines are useless!

213729.en:
When the meteorite appeared, I saw Master Mereade and His Majesty Quard talking behind the gate of the Army
Ward. His Majesty was nodding his head, but Mereade was firm, so I'm sure he has some secret plan.

213731.en:
Hee hee hee. I may be a recluse, but I'm well aware that the noise outside is caused by a giant meteorite. The
end times have begun. If you want to save your life, you should get the hell out of here. But I think I'll
stay here until the end of my life. This is my only home.
213731.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚¤ãƒ’ãƒ’ãƒƒã€‚åƒ•ã¯ã€€å¼•ãã“ã‚‚ã‚Šã ã‘ã© ã€€å¤–ã®ã€€ã•ã‚ãã®åŸå› ãŒã€€å·¨å¤§éš•çŸ³ã ã£ã¦ã“ã¨ã¯ ã€€æŠŠæ¡ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¤ã‚‚ã‚Šã•ã€‚
ã€Œã„ã‚ˆã„ã‚ˆã€€çµ‚ã‚ã‚Šã®æ™‚ãŒã€€å§‹ã¾ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã€‚ ã€€å‘½ãŒæƒœã—ã„ãªã‚‰ã€€ã•ã£ã•ã¨ã€€é€ƒã’ã‚‹ã¹ãã•ã€‚
ã€Œã ã‘ã©ã€€åƒ•ã¯ã€€æœ€æœŸã®æ™‚ã‚’è¿ãˆã‚‹ã¾ã§ ã€€ã“ã“ã«å¼•ãã“ã‚‚ã£ã¦ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã†ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€åƒ•ã®å®¶ã¯ã€€ã“ã“ã ã‘ã•â€¦â€¦ã‚¤ãƒ’ãƒƒã€‚

213733.en:
I wonder what will happen to this country. I try to calm down by looking at the waterway, but the meteorite
keeps making me anxious.

213735.en:
People are worried because of the giant meteorite. It's at times like this that I want to use the power of
my singing to cheer everyone up.

213737.en:
remembered that he could protect Royal City from meteorites by activating the Eternal Ring, which is
located in the plaza.

213739.en:
The giant device is spinning slowly. I don't know what will happen when I activate the Eternal Ring. Are you
fully prepared?

213741.en:
However, the Eternal Ring could not be moved without Quard breaking the seal. and Mereade waited
patiently for Quard to come.

213743.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Damn it. The meteorite has kept us
very busy! I have to make daily meals
and even prepare emergency rations!

213745.en:
You may look up at the sky and feel a surge of anxiety in the air, but don't worry, the Royal City Protection
Barrier will protect you. The Royal City Protection Barrier will protect you.

213747.en:
Isn't it so hard to make food? Chularis keeps her cheeks full of nuts and walnuts, so it's easy! I'll pack
enough for everyone!

213749.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Are we going to be crushed and
flattened by the causeway?<yesno><break>

213753.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>But the causeway won't stop. If I
don't do this, I'll be flattened.

213755.en:
I went to Army Headquarters to see if there was anything I could do to help, but I was unable to meet Mr. Quard.
Dianji chided me for being too forward. But I couldn't let that stop me! I couldn't stand still!
213755.ja:
ã€Œãªãªãªä½•ã‹ã€€æ‰‹ä¼ãˆã‚‹ã“ã¨ã¯ã€€ãªã„ã®ã‹ã¨ ã€€è»å¸ä»¤éƒ¨ã¸è¡Œã£ãŸã®ã ãŒã€€ã‚¯ã‚¯ã‚¯ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ‰æ§˜ã« ã€€ãŠä¼šã„ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã€€ã‹ã‹â€¦ã‹ãªã‚ãªã‹ã£ãŸã€‚
ã€Œã•ã•ã•å…ˆèµ°ã£ãŸè¡Œå‹•ã ã¨ã€€ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¢ãƒ³ã‚¸ã« ã€€ãŸâ€¦ãŸã—ãªã‚ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã€‚ã ã ã ã€€ã ãŒï¼ ã€€ã„ã¦ã‚‚ãŸã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€€ã„â€¦ã„ã‚‰ã‚Œãªã‹ã£ãŸã®ã ï¼

213757.en:
When I worked in Alchemia, I was told that Royal City had a protective barrier protecting the entire city. I
didn't think anything like what I was seeing would ever happen, but you never know what might happen.

213759.en:
How silly I was to try to use the guidelines as a guide in the midst of a crisis that could have cost me my
life. When I was attacked by the black monster, I learned that I am the one who decides the guidelines of life. I
am so glad that I realized this before I died.

213761.en:
We worked with the military to take down the black monster that infiltrated Royal City. The guidelines
are still not updated, but it's nice to be on your own.

213763.en:
The royal army was about to lose against the black monster, and I was shaking with fear that we might die
like this. But then something inside of me went haywire, and I picked up a sword that was lying on the ground and
joined the Royal Army.

213765.en:
I'm a cash cow, and once I found out that the meteorite had stopped, my will to evacuate out of the country
was shattered. I guess that means I'm still attached to this place.

213769.en:
é€šå¸¸IEI don't have any guidelines, but I've decided to continue selling flowers in this town. I can't be bothered with
meteorites.

213771.en:
I haven't heard the details, but I heard that His Majesty Quard was seriously injured. I hope he will
recover soon.
213771.ja:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>ã€Œãã‚ã—ãã¯ã€€èã„ã¦ãªã„ã®ã ãŒ
ã€€ã‚¯ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ‰é™›ä¸‹ãŒã€€é‡å‚·ã‚’è² ã£ãŸãã†ã ã€‚
ã€€ã¯ã‚„ãã€€å¿«å¾©ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨ã‚ˆã„ã®ã ãŒâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

213773.en:
His Majesty and Mereade together did everything in their power to stop the meteorite. The danger to the Ethene
Kingdom was over.

213775.en:
The Mereade stopped a meteorite from falling on Royal City by manipulating the Eternal Ring. At that time, a
strange monster attacked us, and Royal City was in a mess. I, the Abangiardo, ran around like a maniac.

213777.en:
Earthquakes, meteorites, the appearance of monsters, and several crises seem to have brought change to
the people of Royal City. If we could all just use our brains and do what we do best, maybe we wouldn't need
guidelines anymore.

213779.en:
I still can't believe it. Even though I was weak, I was no soldier, and I had just put the kibosh on a black
monster!

213781.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>I heard a rumor on the wind that some
free men are investigating Strange
Island to the east.<bw_break>

213783.en:
The chaos in the Royal City is over. Some people who were evacuated from outside are coming back one after
another.

213785.en:
I heard that His Majesty was seriously injured.Injury of honor? I'd like to pay my respects to him, so I'll ask a
soldier to do so~.

213787.en:
In case of emergency, I will protect Linka-sama with all my might! Because I am a competent butler! You mean when
the attack happened? I couldn't get to Master Linka who was out of the house at that time. I'm sorry! Please laugh
at myself!

213789.en:
Nancy says she's fine, but a meteorite floating in the air is still an anomaly. I think we should evacuate
the country now.

213791.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>When the creepy monster attacked me, I
thought it was the end... but it turns
out that it's not so bad after all..!

213793.en:
His Majesty Quard is at Army Headquarters, but you will not be able to visit him. He was wounded in the
recent attack on Royal City and is currently undergoing treatment.

213795.en:
If we can defeat Kyuronos, we can surely prevent the destruction of the world! I'm going to the Time Prison in
the Ethenel Cube.

213797.en:
I'm also furious with the black monster. After being scared to death by earthquakes and meteorites for so
long, I'm afraid I'm going to die in even greater fear.

213799.en:
His Majesty is so amazing that he made earthquakes, meteorites, and monster attacks flinch off his back! I'm sure
they'll get that meteor out of the sky of Royal City soon. I'll keep living here, believing that.

213801.en:
The clients who came to ask for smelting are all saying that they can survive without the guidelines and
that they don't need the guidelines.

213803.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I moped up the black monster that had
just crashed into the inn's entrance
and drove it out.<bw_break>

213805.en:
My dad said that since they won't renew the book of the day anymore, I should go out on my own. What should I
write?

213807.en:
We protected Royal City by our own hands without any guidelines. I feel that no matter what disasters may come
our way, we will be able to get through them.

213809.en:
The meteor has stopped moving, and the black monster has flinched. Ethene Kingdom is safe now. I can finally go
back to my studies.

213811.en:
Okay, the meteorite has stopped at Pitary, and in the meantime, I'll work on my alchemy skills~! Someday, I'll
use my alchemy to turn the giant pebble in the sky into gold! Gold, gold, gold, gold!

213813.en:
I heard it. I heard the most disgusting voice when the monster appeared in the Royal City. I think it
was something like this, ''No matter how I use the Eternal Ring, I can't avoid the destruction I bring upon
you. I can't avoid the destruction I will bring about. How sinister!
213813.ja:
ã€Œã‚ãŸã—ã¯ã€€èã„ã¡ã¾ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ç‹éƒ½ã«ã€€ãƒã‚±ãƒ¢ãƒãŒç¾ã‚ŒãŸã¨ãã« ã€€ã¨ã³ã£ãã‚Šã€€æ°—å‘³ã®æ‚ªã„å£°ã‚’ã­ã€‚
ã€ŒãŸã—ã‹ã€€ã“ã†ã•â€¦â€¦æ°¸ä¹…æ™‚ç’°ã‚’ã€€é§†ä½¿ã—ã‚ˆã†ã¨ ã€€æˆ‘ã®ã‚‚ãŸã‚‰ã™ã€€æ»…ã³ã ã‘ã¯ã€€ã¾ã¬ãŒã‚Œãˆã¬ã€‚ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã£ã¦ã­ã€‚ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€ä¸å‰ãªã‚“ã ã‚ã†ï¼

213815.en:
Hey, listen up . When the Hexabeast showed up in Royal City, Shante jumped out to save a soldier. I
was scared that he might get hurt, but when I saw him trying to save a strange soldier, I got all kinds of
feelings.

213817.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Listen to me! I helped the soldier to
exterminate the black monster!<bw_break>

213819.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I almost despaired that I was going to
die because monsters kept showing up
and there were no guidelines.<bw_break>

213821.en:
Hee-hee. I may be a recluse, but I know that the noise outside is caused by a Hexabeast attack. We're in the
middle of the End Times. There's no point in running anywhere. That's why I think I'll stay here until my last
moment. This is my only home.
213821.ja:

ã€Œåƒ•ãŸã¡ã¯ã€€çµ‚ã‚ã‚Šã®æ™‚ã®ã€€æ¸¦ä¸­ã«ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ãã£ã¨ã€€ã©ã“ã¸é€ƒã’ãŸã£ã¦ã€€ãƒ ãƒ€ãªã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œã ã‹ã‚‰ã€€åƒ•ã¯ã€€æœ€æœŸã®ç¬é–“ã‚’è¿ãˆã‚‹ã¾ã§ ã€€ã“ã“ã«å¼•ãã“ã‚‚ã£ã¦ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã†ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€åƒ•ã®å®¶ã¯ã€€ã“ã“ã ã‘ã•â€¦â€¦ã‚¤ãƒ’ãƒƒã€‚

213823.en:
We Royal City folk are used to the sight of the Royal Palace floating in the air, and we are used to having
huge things overhead. So I think that the giant meteorite will soon become just another day in the life of the
city.

213825.en:
Listen . It seems that the power of my song protected the soldiers and everyone in town from the
Hexabeast. Next time, I'm going to perform a song from the top of the stage that will turn the audience into
tricolors. I'm going to practice hard.

213827.en:
Kyururu whispered to <pc>
from inside the Ethenel Cube.

213829.en:
The huge device is slowly rotating. The Eternal Ring seems to be operating normally, as the meteorite above it
has stopped.

213831.en:
The evacuation out of the country has been cancelled, but I'm still preparing emergency rations on a daily
basis. You never know what might happen at any time.

213833.en:
You may look up at the sky and feel a surge of anxiety in your heart, but don't worry. The Eternal Ring has
protected this country.

213835.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I heard that the waters no longer
descend. It's soaring in the sky all
the time like an ethene balloon.

213837.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr><pc>! I seem to have a hole
in my heart!<bw_break>

213839.en:
At one point I was thinking of evacuating out of the country, but since the meteorite crisis seems to
have passed, I guess I'll have to put that off for the time being. Nevertheless, this time has made me
realize how important it is to be prepared for disasters. We must continue to do nothing but be
prepared.
213839.ja:
ã€Œä¸€æ™‚ã¯ã€€å›½å¤–ã¸ã®é¿é›£ã‚‚è€ƒãˆã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸãŒ ã€€éš•çŸ³è½ä¸‹ã®å±æ©Ÿã¯ã€€å»ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ãªã®ã§ ã€€å½“é¢ã®ã‚ã„ã ã€€è¦‹é€ã‚Šã§ã™ã‹ã­â€¦â€¦ã€‚

213841.en:
I heard it. I heard the most disgusting voice when the monster appeared in the Royal City. I think it
was something like this, ''No matter how I use the Eternal Ring, I can't avoid the destruction I bring upon
you. I can't avoid the destruction I will bring about. How sinister!
213841.ja:
ã€Œã‚ãŸã—ã¯ã€€èã„ã¡ã¾ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ç‹éƒ½ã«ã€€ãƒã‚±ãƒ¢ãƒãŒç¾ã‚ŒãŸã¨ãã« ã€€ã¨ã³ã£ãã‚Šã€€æ°—å‘³ã®æ‚ªã„å£°ã‚’ã­ã€‚

215010.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Is there anything else you'd like to
confirm?
<select>
On stopping submersion
How to collect ground energies
Nothing in particular
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

215248.en:
Inside the giant, slowly spinning device, a strange-colored, shimmering liquid seems to mark time with
regularity.

222019.en:
Surprising, isn't it? These days, earthquakes like this one happen all the time, and they're making everyone
uneasy. What? Enough about earthquakes, you want me to tell you about Made Temple? Well, it's a story
that a simple soldier wouldn't understand. But perhaps Your Majesty might know. He's in the commander's
office at Army Headquarters right now, so you might want to pay him a visit.
222019.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã©ã‚ã„ãŸã ã‚ï¼Ÿã€€æœ€è¿‘ã¯ ã€€ä»Šã¿ãŸã„ãªåœ°éœ‡ãŒã€€ã—ã‚‡ã£ã¡ã‚…ã†ã€€èµ·ã“ã‚Š ã€€çš†ã‚’ã€€ä¸å®‰ãŒã‚‰ã›ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã ã€‚
ã€Œãªã«ï¼Ÿã€€åœ°éœ‡ã®è©±ã¯ã€€ã‚‚ã†ã„ã„ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ãƒãƒ‡ç¥æ®¿ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ã»ã—ã„ã ã¨â€¦â€¦ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã†ãƒ¼ã‚€ã€€ã—ãŒãªã„å…µå£«ã«ã¯ã€€ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã‹ã­ã‚‹è©±ã ã€‚
ã€Œã ãŒã€€é™›ä¸‹ãªã‚‰ã€€ã”å­˜ã˜ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã‚“ã€‚ ã€€ä»Šã¯ã€€è»å¸ä»¤éƒ¨ã®ã€€è»å›£é•·å®¤ã«ãŠã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ ã€€è¨ªã­ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ãŒã€€ã‚ˆã‹ã‚ã†ã€‚

222021.en:
You're looking into Made Temple? Well, it's not something that a simple soldier would understand. But His
Majesty might know something about it. He is currently in the commander's office at Army Headquarters, so you
might want to pay him a visit.

224318.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>But it's all right now, isn't it?
Because I heard that the new king is
going to rebuild this country.

224320.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>But I bet he's lying. If he was in
Royal City, he would have stopped by
my house to buy some cat stuff.

224322.en:
What a complicated recipe! I get dizzy just thinking about the steps. As an alchemist's egg, I can't do it! If
anyone could do it, it would be my master Gandak or Zef. Anyway, I can't do it!
224322.ja:
ã€Œãªâ€¦ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€è¤‡é›‘ãªãƒ¬ã‚·ãƒ”ãªã‚“ã ï¼ ã€€æ‰‹é †ã‚’è€ƒãˆã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã€€ãã‚‰ãã‚‰ã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘è¡“å¸«ã®ã‚¿ãƒã‚´ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€€ç§ã«ã¯ã€€ãƒ ãƒªã ãƒƒï¼

224324.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>But yes, I think Gandak and Zef might
still be able to make it.

224326.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Well, if I can't do it, maybe Zef can.
Why don't you ask him for a recipe?

224328.en:
This is where the Detection Rods I just gave you come in handy. Please try them now. They work in and out of
my house. If you use the Detection Rods at Royal City Kimbel, please let me know and I will tell you the rest
of the story.

224330.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>To absorb geothermal energy from the
ground, you have to find a specific
location.<bw_break>

224332.en:
I will do my best to support Mr. Quard in the future. If you have a chance, please cooperate with us
.

224334.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>So, I'm negotiating with Mockin, the
innkeeper, if he'll let me perform on
stage again. Stay tuned!

224629.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>However, I have always relied on the
guidelines, so what can I say to my
children at this point in their lives?

224631.en:
I'm grateful for it, but I can't say I'm happy about it. But I can't rejoice when I think it's because of
that thing floating above my head.

224633.en:
Not only did I lose my job as a housekeeper, but I'm going to lose my life too? That's what I mean when I
say ''bee on my knees''!

224635.en:
The reality is that we do not know how long the protection barriers will last. We should be prepared to
evacuate.

224637.en:
I heard that there are people who did the same thing as me here and there. It's a strange thing to find out,
isn't it, even though it wasn't written in the guidelines.

224639.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I can't imagine living in a world
without Mr. Quard.<bw_break>

224641.en:
When the royal palace disappeared, we endured it by believing that he would surely be alive. But this time, it
happened right before our eyes.

224643.en:
Well, it was a spur-of-the-moment action to save a soldier who was about to be killed. How could they do that
without any guidelines?

224645.en:
If you have any tips on how to land on an island that is supposed to be inaccessible due to ocean currents,
I'd love to hear them.

224647.en:
When I came to my senses, I was throwing the Kanashibari balls that Mr. Yong had made at the monsters on
the street. It was a great feeling!

224649.en:
It's like a cash cow. A few weeks ago, you were all looking at me like I was the one that was screwing up because
the guidelines weren't being updated.

224651.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I was struggling to stay alive. It's
as if his body moved naturally.

224653.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>That boy who died was also a man who
acted for the sake of others.

224655.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I've done some whip-jaw stuff. Seeing
His Majesty and Mereade doing their
best motivated me to do something.

224657.en:
But when I thought about how to escape and made my move, I survived. Even if there are no guidelines, human beings
can manage somehow.

224659.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I can't even cry. I should be sad, but
I don't feel anything.<bw_break>

224661.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Kukuku, Master Quard is no more. I am
just dumbfounded by that fact.

228151.en:
<pipipi_high>Your Majesty! Your father is alive!
Let's hurry to the Army Headquarters
<pc>.

228829.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Wow! Did you see the sky? What's going
to happen to us? Boring life in the
Royal City is about to change.

228831.en:
Wow! Did you see the sky? What's going to happen to us? Boring life in Royal City is about to change. What? What is
it? What do you want from me?

228833.en:
Mom's stewed beef cheeks. It's so good, isn't it? Ah, I want some! I want some! I'm worried about
meteorites, so maybe I should go home for once. But I'm sure I'll be told in detail again when I get back. Ugh.
228833.ja:

234889.en:
I'm sorry. I was in an accident a
while ago and my memory is still not
clear.

234891.en:
My head! What the hell happened back there? Hello, my name is Regul. My name is Regul. I'm Regul, and your
name is ? You seem to be well traveled. I have a favor to ask of someone as well-traveled as you.
Please just listen to what I have to say. I used to live in a maritime city called Rinjahar. Yes, the port town
where the disaster happened. I was lucky enough to be rescued at the time, but due to the shock, I can't
remember anything that happened before or after the disaster. The only thing I remember is that I had a very
precious pendant with me, but I lost it. I really want to go look for the pendant right away, but my injury is
still not completely healed. So, please . Could you please help me find my precious pendant?

234893.en:
Thank you ! Actually, I have an idea about the pendant.The person who rescued me is a soldier in
this country named Elshido. So, if you go to Army Headquarters and talk to Elshido, he might know something about
the pendant!
234893.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€€ã•ã‚“ï¼ ã€€ã˜ã¤ã¯ã€€ãƒšãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ³ãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€€ã²ã¨ã¤ ã€€æ€ã„ã‚ãŸã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã€€ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã—ã¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚ã€€

234895.en:
Thank you You have a lot of favors to ask of me! I'm sorry, but I can't ask any more favors from such
a busy person. Please come back when you are lighter.
234895.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™â€¦â€¦ã£ã¦ ã€€ã•ã‚“ã€€ãšã„ã¶ã‚“ ã€€é ¼ã¾ã‚Œã”ã¨ã‚’ã€€æŠ±ãˆã¦ã„ã‚‹ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã§ã™ã‹ï¼

234897.en:
I see. I guess I'll just have to wait
for the injury to heal. I don't know
when that will be.

234899.en:
I used to live in a place called Rinjahar, a maritime city, and as you know, that disaster happened. I was
lucky to be rescued, but due to the shock, I can't remember anything that happened before and after the
disaster. The only thing I remember is that I lost my precious pendant that I had with me. So please, .
Could you please help me find my precious pendant?
234899.ja:
ã€Œåƒ•ã¯ä»¥å‰ã€€æµ·æ´‹éƒ½å¸‚ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒãƒ«ã£ã¦ã„ã†æ‰€ã« ã€€ä½ã‚“ã§ã„ãŸã®ã§ã™ãŒã€€çŸ¥ã£ã¦ã®ã¨ãŠã‚Š ã€€ä¾‹ã®ç½å®³ãŒã€€èµ·ã“ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ã¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚

234901.en:
Utsura, Utsura. What the hell~! Let me
rest a little longer~!

234903.en:
I'm exhausted from all the running
around and spinning to check on the
damage in Royal City. I'm so tired.

234905.en:
Hmm? You mean you don't know the pendant that Regul was wearing when I rescued him in Rinjahar? No. I didn't
see a pendant when I rescued that man. But he had this instead. I forgot to give it to him. I'm sorry, but please
give this to him.

234907.en:
The person who transported me from Rinjahar to Royal City was a soldier named Elshido. So, if you go to Army
Headquarters and talk to him, he might be able to tell you something about the pendant I lost!

234909.en:
Would you like to ask Elshido about
Regul's lost pendant?<yesno><close>

234911.en:
<pc> received the Music
Festival Pamphlet (Key Item) from
Elshido!

234913.en:
I was deployed as a rescue team for a major disaster, and even now I sometimes dream about that hellish
Rinjahar. The whole town smelled like burnt-out and nasty, and the wreckage that had been eaten away was scattered
everywhere. That man must have hit his head or something, because he passed out. In a way, it was a blessing. And
at the time, Regul wasn't wearing a pendant. Instead, he was holding the Music Festival Pamphlet I gave you.
I'm sorry, but you'll have to take it to him, won't you?
234913.ja:
ã€Œä¿ºã¯ã€€å¤§ç½å®³ã«ã€€æ•‘åŠ©éšŠã¨ã—ã¦æ´¾é£ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚“ã ãŒ ã€€ã‚ã®æ™‚ã®ã€€åœ°ç„ã¿ãŸã„ãªãƒªãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒãƒ«ã¯ ã€€ä»Šã§ã‚‚ã€€ã¨ãã©ãã€€å¤¢ã«è¦‹ã‚‹ã‚ˆâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

234915.en:
Ah <pc>! Have you talked to
Elshido about the pendant I lost?

234917.en:
I see. If you can talk to Elshido at
Army Headquarters, please let me know!

234919.en:
Thank you! Is this the Bread Fret? Rinjahal Restoration Music Festival? Our guest is the Flower Diva from
Ethene Kingdom. Held at the Rinjahar Grand Theatre. That's right! I remember now! I was in charge of this
music festival! I even invited a famous singer. I invited a famous singer, a lovely and very kind young
lady named Shante. She was very kind to us, the organizers. But in the middle of the festival, Rinjahar was
hit by a big disaster. She died in front of my eyes! Oh! I also remembered that I had lost my precious
pendant near the Rinjahar Grand Theatre. So, if you look around the theater, you may be able to find the
pendant. It is a pendant with a beryl stone.
234919.ja:

234921.en:
Perhaps the building was destroyed during the catastrophe, but the Grand Theater was on the east side of Rinja
Tower.

234923.en:
Would you like to give Regul the Music
Festival Pamphlet?<yesno><close>

234925.en:
<pc> gave Regul the Music
Festival Pamphlet he received from
Elshido!

234927.en:
While I was busy preparing for the music festival, I lost my precious pendant near the Rinjahal Grand
Theater. So, if you look around the theater, you may be able to find the pendant. It is a pendant with a beryl
stone. The building may have been destroyed during the catastrophe, but the Grand Theater was located on the
east side of Rinja Tower.

234929.en:
Ah <pc>. If you didn't bring
my precious pendant!

234931.en:
Is that so? I would appreciate it if
you could help me with the pendant.

234933.en:
This is a beryl stone! It's battered
and bruised, but it's unmistakably my
pendant! Ah! I remember everything.

234935.en:
I used to work for Rinjara, the mayor of the maritime city of Rinjahar. He is young, but very talented, well-
liked by the citizens, and a truly wonderful person. So, I am very happy to see him. . Actually,
this pendant is the key to the underground archives in Rinjahar. If you fit the beryl stone of this
pendant into the small indentation on the door, it will unlock the archives. The archives has a Memory Crystal in
it, so could you please fetch it for me? I will leave the pendant with you.

234937.en:
I'm sorry to keep repeating myself, but thank you for your patience. The underground archives for Rinjahar
should be located in the southwest corner of the building as seen from the tower.

234939.en:
Would you like me to give you Regul's
Pendant?<yesno><close>

234945.en:
Thank you for everything. Thanks to you, I remember everything. I am sorry, but you need
to go to Rinjahar again and bring the Memory Crystal from the underground archives. The basement archives are
located in the building to the southwest of Rinja Tower. I'm sorry to keep repeating myself, but please,
please, please. I'm not lost anymore. I will surely save him.

234947.en:
Dear Mayor Rinjara of Rinjahar, a friendly city of Ethene Kingdom. I have something to tell you. My brother
Padre is a man of great talent, but he is also arrogant and arrogant to the point of arrogance. Even you, my old
friend, look down on him. Moreover, that foolish brother, driven by ambition, has been plotting to take
Rinjahar away from you. Taking advantage of Rinjahar's crisis, he went all the way to sell his favors to
you, which is the first step in his scheme. Such an outrage should not be tolerated! As the head of Rinjahar,
you must take immediate action!

234949.en:
Oh. What a surprise. It's too late for
everything. Oh, <pc>. Did you
bring my Memory Crystal?
234949.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚â€¦â€¦ã€‚ãªã‚“ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã™ã¹ã¦ã¯ã€€æ‰‹é…ã‚Œã ã£ãŸãªã‚“ã¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œã‚ã£ã€€ã•ã‚“â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã‚‚ã—ã‚„ã€€åƒ•ã®ã€€è¨˜æ†¶ã®çµæ™¶ã‚’ ã€€æŒã£ã¦ãã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã®ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ

234951.en:
Was that so? But he is no longer with
us. No, nothing.

234953.en:
Oh. Thank you. It's old, but it's definitely that crystal. But it's all too late. While you were retrieving
the crystals, I was told that both Rinjara and Padre had already passed away. I suppose it was out of concern
for the people of this country. I was not told of Rinjahar's demise until today. I was not told that Rinjahar
had been destroyed until today. Shortly after Rinjahar's recovery from the plague, this Memory Crystal was
sent to Rinjara-sama from the Ethene Kingdom. I will show the true fruit to you who brought the
crystal to me.
234953.ja:

ã€Œâ€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚

ã€Œã•ã‚“â€¦â€¦ ã€€çµæ™¶ã‚’ã€€æŒã£ã¦ãã¦ãã ã•ã£ãŸ ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã«ã¯ã€€çœŸå®Ÿã‚’ãŠè¦‹ã›ã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†â€¦â€¦ã€‚

234955.en:
After receiving the Memory Crystal, I began to notice disturbing incidents of people in Rinjahar craning their
necks. So I took the crystal out of Rinjara's private room and checked its contents. I hid the Memory Crystal in
the underground archives to prevent anyone from suspecting Rinjara's involvement in the disappearance. He
was truly a kind, wise, and wonderful person. But I never thought that Rinjahar had already been destroyed
and Rinjara-sama and Padre-sama had passed away! Ah. If only I had had the courage to ask Rinjara-sama about the
truth, such a tragedy might have been avoided. Because of me, I have caused you a lot of trouble
this time. This is my apology at the very least.

234957.en:
This sin is so serious that I may never be able to atone for it in my own life, but as someone who was close
to the truth of that catastrophe, I am determined to find a way to atone for it, even if it takes the rest of my
life.

234959.en:
Would you like to give Regul's Memory
Crystal?<yesno><close>

234963.en:
When Regul raised the Memory Crystal,
a three-dimensional image of Domineus
appeared!

234967.en:
I am sorry for all the trouble I have caused this time. Rinjara-sama was a kind and sensitive
person, but he was passionate about his work and a wonderful person who served his people well. I just
couldn't bear the thought of such a person being suspected of a crime and having his honor tarnished. If only I
had had the courage to face the truth, such a tragedy could have been avoided and Rinjara-sama might not have died.
My sins are too serious, but as someone who was close to the true facts of that catastrophe, I would
like to atone for them even if it takes the rest of my life. When I recover from this injury, I will go to
Alltrades Abbey and pray every day for those who died.

245344.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Yeehaw. Welcome <pc>. Is
something bothering you that you came
all the way here to see me, eh?

245345.en:
Genaf? Yeah, from Freedom Village. If you write to him and ask him for materials, he will collect them for
you. It's troublesome that I have to explain to him in my letters of request about such things, though,
because he sometimes collects nonsensical materials. I'm a social recluse, but I can't refuse
's request, and I'd like to cooperate with him. If it's possible for a shut-in to do so.

245346.en:
This is one hell of an advanced recipe. It's too bright in here for me to concentrate. I need to retreat to a
dark, calm room. I'm going to stay in my room for a while, so come back when the time is right.

245347.en:
Luon is in Mr. Zef's room. He's behind
the counter.

245348.en:
informed Luon that Genaf had asked him to consult with us to see if we could simplify the recipe
for high-functioning alchemical foods.

245349.en:
When Luon received the Efficient
Alchemy Food Book from <pc>,
he read it all the way through!

245350.en:
Luon tucked the Efficient Alchemy Food
Book into his pocket and left Zef's
room.<se map_common 40 ><se map_common 41 >

245351.en:
Yikes. I was interrupted in my thoughts by Kunai. . If you can figure out the recipe for
high-performance alchemicals, I'll leave here and go to Zef's room so you can talk to me there, yippee.

245352.en:
<pipipi_mid>Yikes. Is that voice <pc>?
I'm very busy right now, so please
don't talk to me.

245452.en:
It seems to take a while to figure out the recipe for high performance alchemicals. I'll see Luon in Zef's
room when the time is right.
